course_name: Study of Religion: Specialist Teaching Area
description: This course is designed to challenge pre-service teachers to use their knowledge, expertise and experience to design learning environments that will engage students in the learning process and cater for a variety of learning styles. It aims to introduce participants to the history, psychology and sociology of some of the world's major religions. Participants will have the opportunity to develop resources and skills to teach the study of religion curriculum offered in Queensland schools.
prerequisites: Entry to the Graduate Diploma of Education (Secondary) or entry to Bachelor of Education (Secondary) (Dual degree) professional year.
